title: Analyzing Operator States and the Impact of AI-Enhanced Decision Support in Control Rooms: A Human-in-the-Loop Specialized Reinforcement Learning Framework for Intervention Strategies
abstract: arXiv:2402.13219v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: In complex industrial and chemical process control rooms, effective decision-making is crucial for safety and effi- ciency. The experiments in this paper evaluate the impact and applications of an AI-based decision support system integrated into an improved human-machine interface, using dynamic influ- ence diagrams, a hidden Markov model, and deep reinforcement learning. The enhanced support system aims to reduce operator workload, improve situational awareness, and provide different intervention strategies to the operator adapted to the current state of both the system and human performance. Such a system can be particularly useful in cases of information overload when many alarms and inputs are presented all within the same time window, or for junior operators during training. A comprehensive cross-data analysis was conducted, involving 47 participants and a diverse range of data sources such as smartwatch metrics, eye- tracking data,

translated_title: 分析操作员状态和AI增强决策支持对控制室的影响：一种人在回路中的专门强化学习框架用于干预策略
translated_abstract: 在复杂的工业和化学过程控制室中，有效的决策对安全性和效率至关重要。本文中的实验评估了集成到改进的人机界面中的AI决策支持系统的影响和应用，使用动态影响图、隐马尔科夫模型和深度强化学习。增强的支持系统旨在减少操作员的工作负荷，提高情境意识，并根据系统和人类表现的当前状态为操作员提供不同的干预策略。这样的系统在信息过载的情况下特别有用，当许多警报和输入同时呈现在同一个时间窗口内，或者在培训期间对初级操作员来说尤其有用。进行了广泛的交叉数据分析，涉及47名参与者和各种数据来源，如智能手表指标、眼动数据等。
tldr: 本研究提出了一种专门强化学习框架，集成了AI决策支持系统，旨在改善控制室操作员的工作效率和情境意识，并为其提供根据系统和人类表现状态量身定制的干预策略。
en_tdlr: This study introduces a specialized reinforcement learning framework integrated with an AI decision support system aimed at improving the efficiency and situational awareness of control room operators by providing tailored intervention strategies based on the state of the system and human performance.
